001package gust.backend;
002
003
004import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
005import javax.annotation.Nullable;
006import java.io.IOException;
007import java.io.InputStream;
008
009/**
010 * Responsible for any testable functionality that occurs when bootstrapping a Java-based application, including
011 * force-resolving critical configuration files, setting up logging, and so on.
012 */
013public final class ApplicationBoot {
014  private ApplicationBoot() { /* Disallow instantiation. */ }
015
016  /** Root configuration for a Micronaut app. */
017  public static final String rootConfig = "/application.yml";
018
019  /** Default configuration provided by Gust. */
020  public static final String defaultConfig = "/gust" + rootConfig;
021
022  /** Root logging configuration for a Micronaut app. */
023  private static final String loggingConfig = "/logback.xml";
024
025  /** Default configuration provided by Gust. */
026  private static final String defaultLoggingConfig = "/gust" + loggingConfig;
027
028  /**
029   * Report an error that occurred during server startup, which prevented the server from starting. Errors encountered
030   * and reported in this manner are fatal.
031   *
032   * @param err Fatal error that occurred and prevented server startup.
033   */
034  public static void reportStartupError(@Nonnull Throwable err) {
035    System.err.println("Uncaught exception: " + err.getMessage());
036    err.printStackTrace(System.err);
037    throw new IllegalStateException(
038      String.format("Catastrophic startup error thrown: %s.", err.getMessage()));
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Attempt to load a given global config file, failing if we can't find it in the expected spot, or the backup spot,
043   * optionally provided as the second param.
044   *
045   * @param role Role description for this file.
046   * @param name Configuration file name.
047   * @param alt Alternate configuration file name.
048   * @throws RuntimeException Wrapping an {@link IOException}, If the configuration can't be loaded.
049   */
050  public static void loadConfig(@Nonnull String role, @Nonnull String name, @Nullable String alt) {
051    try (final InputStream configStream = ApplicationBoot.class.getResourceAsStream(name)) {
052      if (configStream == null) {
053        if (alt != null) {
054          try (final InputStream defaultConfigStream = ApplicationBoot.class.getResourceAsStream(alt)) {
055            if (defaultConfigStream == null)
056              throw new IOException("Loaded config was `null` (for configuration '" + role + "').");
057            return;  // we loaded it at the alternate location: good to go
058          }
059        }
060        throw new IOException("Config stream was `null` when loaded (for configuration '" + role + "').");
061      }
062
063    } catch (IOException ioe) {
064      System.out.println("Failed to load server configuration '" + role + "'. Failing.");
065      throw new RuntimeException(ioe);
066    }
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Load main application configs, including the `app` config (usually `application.yml`), containing configuration for
071   * Micronaut, and `logback.xml` which contains configuration for logging. If either config file cannot be loaded, then
072   * an error is thrown which prevents server startup.
073   */
074  public static void load() {
075    // validate config & start the server
076    loadConfig("app", rootConfig, defaultConfig);
077    loadConfig("logging", loggingConfig, defaultLoggingConfig);
078  }
079}
